name: The Trap Door (itch)
description: The Trap Door is a room-based virtual reality game children-friendly. The game is based on the 80's animated television series "The Trap Door" (created by Terry Brain and Charlie Mills) , and its 8-bit classic videogame (created by Don Priestley); indeed, the game is a remake of the classic 8 bit videogame, but in virtual reality! You will work in the kitchen of a castle full of monsters, preparing strange dishes for the mysterious owner. You will have to find out how to get the ingredients and cook the strange plates . The faster you deliver the dish, the better it will pay you at the end of the day. Boni, Drut, and the monsters that live under the trap door will help you in your work.
